history.narrative: Law 6-160 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-488. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 24, 1986 and July 8, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 16, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-205 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
